Package entity

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
entity.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
It Represents a Movie and its information
Version:
8/11/2022
Author:
OOP SSP1 Group 4

    Enumerators.ShowingStatus
    getShowingStatus()
    Query the showing status of the movie Showing status is automatically derived from movie's releaseDate, endDate and the current LocalDate from the system clock Returns "END OF SHOWING" if current date is after movie end date Returns "NOW SHOWING" if current date is after release date and before end date Returns "PREVIEW" if current date is within 7 days before release date Returns "COMING SOON" if current date is more than 7 days before release date

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int id, String title, String synopsis, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, ArrayList<String> genres, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate, Enumerators.ContentRating contentRating, Enumerators.MovieType movieType)
      Creates a movie with the given attributes By default, a movie will have no reviews and no ticketSales on creation
      Parameters:
      id - It is the unique movie id
      title - The name of the movie
      synopsis - The summary of the movie
      director - The directors of the film
      cast - The names of the people who have acted in the movie
      genres - The type of genre portrayed by the film
      releaseDate - The date when the film is going be released
      endDate - The date when the film is going to end in the theatre
      contentRating - The content rating of the movie, whether it is PG, NC17 etc.
      movieType - The type of movie

    • getShowingStatus

      public Enumerators.ShowingStatus getShowingStatus()
      Query the showing status of the movie Showing status is automatically derived from movie's releaseDate, endDate and the current LocalDate from the system clock Returns "END OF SHOWING" if current date is after movie end date Returns "NOW SHOWING" if current date is after release date and before end date Returns "PREVIEW" if current date is within 7 days before release date Returns "COMING SOON" if current date is more than 7 days before release date
      Returns:
      Showing Status of the movie
